title: Made a new account because i couldn't  log in to my main. Turns out i was hacked...
body:
I'm an on and off LoL player since 2010 and have never experienced having my account getting hacked throughout my years. Things didn't add up when i tried to recover my account with the email etc. Made this account, stalked my own profile to see "i" had recently been playing.. even roles im not comfortable playing. i only play mages/lux (even said 84% mages or something) but this person ruined it by playing adc :(( poop. 

I couldn't seem to find where to contact riot directly?

And i don't think i have enough proof/reciepts to back up my statement that this is my original account.

- I have old videos from 2011'ish of me playing on my account though.
- recently asked my irl friend to check if im still in his friends list to help me prove it?
 
Very sentimental about that account, has so much history.
Even have/had the green banner and not to mention skins.
Hopefully a miracle can happen, if not i'm willing to accept my faith.

replies.body: You can absolutely get that account back as long as you can verify that you were the one who created the account with a few key questions. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure to pick "I need help recovering my account". Keep in mind that videos of gameplay can be found by anyone, so those videos aren't going to help with the recovery. Focus on those questions, and you'll be back on in no time.
